level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90-day) amendment of section, see § 1602(c) of the Service Improvement and Fiscal Year 2000 Budget Support Emergency Act of 1999 (D.C. Act 13-110, July 28, 1999, 46 DCR 6320).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 14-18
level.text: For D.C. Law 14-18, see notes following § 44-401.
